name: Banana Cake X
author: BETHMCSHANE
summary: This is an incredibly moist banana cake from a mix... I always serve it with caramel icing and get raves every time!
directions: Preheat oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C)
Grease and flour a 9x13 inch pan
Put 1 tablespoon lemon juice in a measuring cup with 2/3 cup milk
Mash bananas with a fork, adding the remaining 1 tablespoon lemon juice to them as you mash
In a large bowl, combine cake  mix and baking soda
Add bananas, softened butter, milk mixture, eggs and vanilla
Beat at low speed until moistened (about 30 seconds)
Beat at medium speed for 4 minutes
Bake in the preheated oven for 30 to 35  minutes, or until center of cake springs back when lightly tapped
A toothpick stuck in the center may leave a slight crumb
Allow to cool on a wire rack
